Package hac.services

Class BoardService

java.lang.Object
hac.services.BoardService
@Service public class BoardService extends Object
The service is an api to the boards DB.

  • Method Details

    • getTwoDimensionalArrayByPlayer

      private ArrayList<ArrayList<String>> getTwoDimensionalArrayByPlayer(Player player, Boolean getSubmarine)
      The function returns the board of the received player's as 2D array. The boolean parameter says if the return value should fill the submarines or not.
      Parameters:
      player - The player id.
      getSubmarine - If the submarines should be displayed in the response.
      Returns:
      The board of the received player's as 2D array

    • getOpponentBoardsByUsername

      public HashMap<String,ArrayList<ArrayList<String>>> getOpponentBoardsByUsername(String username)
      The function returns all the received player's opponents' boards. Assumption - The function who used this method locked the dbLock + room's lock for reading.
      Parameters:
      username - The player.
      Returns:
      All the player opponents' boards.

    • getUserTwoDimensionalArrayBoardByUsername

      public ArrayList<ArrayList<String>> getUserTwoDimensionalArrayBoardByUsername(String username)
      The function gets the user's 2D array board by the player's username. Assumption - the function who used this method already locked db + room's lock for reading.
      Parameters:
      username - A string includes the username
      Returns:
      2D array board by the player's username
